Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Pakhaas with a back-pillar.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1992 Jul-Oct, Norfolk, Swaffham Museum, Ancient Egypt 2005-2006 Oct-Feb, Houston Museum of Natural Sciences, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006 7 Mar-6 Aug, Mobile (Alabama), Gulf Coast Exploreum Science Center, Mummy: The Inside Story 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story
